DataElement.preferredDefinition: the yes/no/unknown indicator that asks whether a surgical oncology consultation was performed.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information relating to a surgical oncologist (a doctor who performs biopsies and other surgical procedures in cancer patients) consultation (the act of conferring with another researcher, physician, or expert about an issue or a case) performed (carried out).

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A doctor who performs biopsies and other surgical procedures in cancer patients.

Concepts.definition: A doctor who specializes in surgical treatment of cancer.

Property.preferredDefinition: A conference between two or more people to consider a particular question; the act of deliberating together; confering with another researcher, physician, or expert about an issue or a case.:Performed; carried out.

Concepts.definition: A conference between two or more people to consider a particular question; the act of deliberating together; confering with another researcher, physician, or expert about an issue or a case.
Executed and carried through to completion.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no/unknown.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not known, not observed, not recorded, or refused.

Concepts.definition: Not known, observed, recorded; or reported as unknown by the data contributor.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no/unknown.

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of yes, no, or unknown.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.2.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Retired DBW 4-27-2016 per Tina Taylor approved by Dianne Reeves

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. 3/35/2016 jk removed "indeterminate" value that was added in error. 7/7/2021wz: added ALT VM name for HOPE-CARE project.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Was a surgical oncology consu
ReferenceDocuments.description: Was a surgical oncology consultation performed

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text_3
ReferenceDocuments.description: Surgical consultation performed to determine whether or not the patient is a candidate for resection after completion of chemoradiation?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text_1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Was surgical consultation performed confirming that the patient will be able to undergo curative resection after completion of chemoradiation?

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG_CRF TEXT 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Was a surgical assessment performed within 42 days prior to registration demonstrating the patient is a candidate for surgical intervention with sentinel lymph node (SLN) biopsy and potential completion neck dissection (CND) or elective neck dissection (END) including a surgical resection of the primary tumor that will occur through a transoral approach with anticipation of resection free margins?

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG_CRF TEXT 2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is the patient is a candidate for surgical intervention with sentinel lymph node (SLN) biopsy and potential completion neck dissection (CND) or elective neck dissection (END) including a surgical resection of the primary tumor that will occur through a transoral approach with anticipation of resection free margins?

DataElement.origin: RTOG CRF:Radiation Therapy Oncology Group Case Report Form
DataElement.changeDescription: Replaced VD Assessment Ind-3 (2018441v1) with VD Yes No Unknown Indicator (3506034v1) - dbw
